an4.238:1.2: idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti …pe… idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam kanham kanhavipakam.
an4.238:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti …pe… idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam sukkam sukkavipakam.
an4.238:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi kayasankharam abhisankharoti …pe… idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam.
an4.238:4.1: Katamanca, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati?
an4.238:4.2: Satisambojjhango, dhammavicayasambojjhango, viriyasambojjhango, pitisambojjhango, passaddhisambojjhango, samadhisambojjhango, upekkhasambojjhango—
an4.238:4.3: idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.238:4.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani”ti.
